text: Kaje'i, tomadera purbabati jati gulira madhye emana satkarmasila kena ra'ila na, yara prthibite biparyaya srsti karate badha dita; tabe mustimeya loka chila yaderake ami tadera madhya hate raksa karechi. Ara papisthara to bhoga bilase matta chila yara samagri taderake yathesta deya hayechila. Asale tara chila maha aparadhi.
